snippet: United Nations peacekeeping missions need stronger commitments from member nations.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Benjamin Kahn, the former official for the United Nations mission in Sudan, asserts that the capacity for UN peacekeeping operations to deploy troops and secure equipment is dependent on the steadfastness of individual countries in backing them; argues that member nations, and specifically the United States, should increase their support for peacekeeping efforts.
lead_paragraph: United Nations peacekeeping missions need stronger commitments from member nations.

headline.seo: Don’t Paralyze the United Nations Peacekeepers

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
